page.title: 17Hobbies of People in Occold.
page.content: On this Domesday project I have been doing about hobbies.The favourite is gardening because people have bigger gardens around here.Cycling is the next because there are lot of country roads for sight seeing and children cycle alot.In the winter the favourite hobby is watching television because of the weather.In the summer many people enjoy horse riding because we have found there are many green lanes in the area where people can keep of the roads.One of the most worthwhile hobbies is helping the handicapped.Many of the women in the village do knitting and reading.The children support various football clubs and watch them play either on the television or go to watch Ipswich at Portman Road.My favourite hobby is bird watching and I especially like watching birds of prey at Green Farm.
